item.title: Develop an Ethereum oracle with Rust
item.description: A blockchain oracle is a service that allows smart contracts to interact with external data sources. In this post, we will develop a simple oracle that will track every time a Ethereum Name Service NFT is transferred. We will use Rust and the web3 crate to interact with the Ethereum blockchain. 1. Why blockchains can’t access external data sources Blockchains can’t access external data sources natively because it is a deterministic system.
